name: Oneesama
tagline: Experimental Android client for Dynasty Reader
body:
### Download APK
[Oneesama 0.1.0 (Beta 8)](https://github.com/DefiantCatgirl/Oneesama/releases/download/v0.1.8/Oneesama.apk)


![Oneesama QR](http://i.imgur.com/8sGeUaw.png)


### [What's new](https://github.com/DefiantCatgirl/Oneesama/releases/tag/v0.1.8)
* Browse series
* Last opened chapters
* Auto-detect Left-to-Right
* Recent list improved
* Lots of bugfixes

### Downloading chapters
To read chapters in the app open Dynasty Reader in your mobile browser - when you select a chapter on the site the app will intercept the intent and download the chapter.

This may not work in some Android browsers, use the âŠ• button on the toolbar to manually paste a chapter URL. There is also limited in-app browsing.

Gingerbread at your own risk, will likely burn and crash.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
